msIdentifier.idno: Flat Box 7, Folder 861-865 GARRAD COUNTY RECRUITING & RAISING CO. 7th Rgt Ky Militia

body.p: Capt Robert Collier of the Buckeye Precinct in our County desires arms for a cavalry ^company^ There is no company in Capt Colliers district armed.
They have companies armed in the Bryantsville ^& Lancaster^ districts & I learn that companies for each of said districts intend applying for arms.
I think according to the spirit of the law passed last winter Capt Colliers company should be preferred to either of the other companies.
Capt Collier will make affidavit to the foregoing facts if necessary.

Capt R. Collier
Home Guard
Garrard
Filed 8th July 1861.
